Eazy.Guide – The Easiest Way to Record Step-by-Step Instructions

Simplify the way you create, manage, and share instructions with the Eazy.Guide browser extension. Whether you’re onboarding team members, documenting internal processes, or creating how-to guides, Eazy.Guide makes it effortless.

Features:

	📸 Record and Capture: Instantly capture screenshots as you navigate and build step-by-step guides on the fly.
	✍️ Edit and Annotate: Add annotations, descriptions, and highlights to make your instructions crystal clear.
	📂 Organize with Ease: Keep all your guides neatly organized and accessible whenever you need them.
	🔗 Share Instantly: Share guides with your team or clients via a direct link, no extra tools required.
	🌐 Works Across Platforms: Compatible with major web applications, making it perfect for any industry.

Why Choose Eazy.Guide?

	✅ Save Time: Automate the process of creating guides while reducing repetitive work.
	✅ Boost Productivity: Empower your team with clear instructions and reduce miscommunication.
	✅ User-Friendly: No technical skills are required—start creating guides in minutes!

Who is it for?

Eazy.Guide is ideal for solopreneurs, marketing agencies, educators, and teams of all sizes who want to streamline processes and enhance collaboration.

Start documenting smarter today. Install the Eazy.Guide extension and revolutionize how you create and share instructions! 🚀
